scripts.start:dev: npm run dist:dev && concurrently --kill-others "npm run _watch" "npm run _boot --prefix dist/"
scripts.start:dev:bawc: npm run dist:dev:bawc && concurrently --kill-others "npm run _watch" "npm run _boot --prefix dist/"
scripts.start:dev:blng: npm run dist:dev:blng && concurrently --kill-others "npm run _watch" "npm run _boot --prefix dist/"
scripts.start:dev:t: npm run dist:dev:t && concurrently --kill-others "npm run _watch" "npm run _boot --prefix dist/"
scripts.start:prod: npm run dist:prod && cd dist/ && npm run _boot
scripts.dist:dev: npm run _prepare && npm run _config:dev && npm run _build && npm run _prepublish
scripts.dist:dev:bawc: npm run _prepare && npm run _config:dev:bawc && npm run _build && npm run _prepublish
scripts.dist:dev:blng: npm run _prepare && npm run _config:dev:blng && npm run _build && npm run _prepublish
scripts.dist:dev:t: npm run _prepare && npm run _config:dev:t && npm run _build && npm run _prepublish
scripts.dist:prod: npm run _prepare && npm run _config:prod && npm run _build && npm run _prepublish
scripts._prepublish: cp package.json dist/ && cp package-lock.json dist/ && cp -R src/web/ dist/web/ && cp -R store/ dist/store/
